tool.name: Peptide Strcture Builder
tool.description: Builds 3D structures of peptide sequences up to 3 amino acid
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What it does**
This tool generates 3D structures of peptides sequences up to three amino acid that can be utilize for peptide docking with macromolecules with tools such as Autodock Vina.
-----
**Inputs** * **--InFile** Input files contains peptide sequences.
-----
**Outputs** * Return collection of peptides with 3D structure.
